tags: None
review: I had been to Dr. Rachel for serial tooth extraction . She was talking to me like a familiar aunty and always got me distracted from my thoughts related to pain. One tooth was highly  decayed and she cautioned me that a minor cut or surgery would be required. But she was so efficient that she extracted that tooth also in one attempt. I had been travelling from Dubai as part of my treatment and never felt my parent's absence with the kind of care and comfort  I got from Rachel aunty. Above all, I could retain my brave girl image and savour the flavoured ice cream she recommended  after tooth extraction

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is very friendly. She is amicable with the patient. Doctor explained clearly about the current status of my tooth and gum. Already it was decided to remove the tooth, as the gum around the tooth is highly infected and the tooth is shaking. But after the medication for two days (given by Dr. Sanjay) , the gum improved a little. So the doctor decided to save the tooth from removal. So she treated the  infected gum. Now I am feeling better.
BTW, Still I need to wait for one week to tell about  the effectiveness of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been suffering with severe tongue ulcers for over ten days and was trying over-the-counter medication as we normally do. However after trying these i didn't see any improvement and decided to visit Dr. Rachel Jacob. She examined and took the time to understand what I may have been doing/eating differently to have caused the issue. The ointment she gave me cured my ulcers in 48 hours and I am so thankful for her patience and care towards her patients. In this visit she also identified a misaligned tooth which was crowned about 7 years ago and I will be continuing my treatment at her clinic for the same. I have a phobia of going to clinics/hospitals. I certainly recommend her for anyone who is looking for a genuine doctor who can treat you with empathy and care.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback..this means a lotüòä
